name: @qcgm1978/llm-core
description: Core functionality for LLM service providers

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.js && webpack --config webpack.config.js --env target=browser && tsc
scripts.publish-patch: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm version patch && npm publish --access public --force
scripts.publish-minor: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm version minor && npm publish --access public --force
scripts.publish-major: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm version major && npm publish --access public --force

author: qcgm1978
